home.title: EcoPoint
home.subtitle: Scan QR codes and find the nearest recycling points. Together we make the world cleaner!
home.heroSubtitle: The intelligent urban recycling system that combines smart waste bins, IoT technology, and gamification to make sustainability rewarding
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Four simple steps to earn rewards while saving the planet
home.step1Desc: Find an EcoPoint bin and scan the QR code with your mobile app
home.step2Desc: Dispose your recyclable waste in the correct bin compartment
home.step3Desc: Receive EcoPoints instantly based on the type and amount of waste
home.step4Desc: Exchange points for discounts, tickets, and exclusive offers
home.residentsFeature1: Earn rewards for every recycling action
home.residentsFeature2: Track your environmental impact in real-time
home.residentsFeature3: Compete with friends and climb the eco-leaderboard
home.residentsFeature4: Access exclusive discounts from local businesses
home.businessFeature1: Attract eco-conscious customers to your business
home.businessFeature4: Reduce operational costs with optimized collection
home.smartCityDesc: EcoPoint uses IoT sensors and AI to optimize waste collection routes, reduce carbon emissions by up to 40%, and increase recycling rates by 60% in participating neighborhoods. Together, we're building the sustainable cities of tomorrow.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of eco-conscious citizens making their cities greener, one recycling action at a time
home.binMapDesc: Find recycling bins near you on an interactive map with real-time locations
home.rankingDesc: Compare your recycling efforts with other users and compete for the top spot
home.userStatsDesc: Track your monthly and total points, unlock achievements for your eco-friendly actions
home.rewardsDesc: Redeem your earned points for exclusive offers and eco-friendly products
home.recognitionDesc: Smart technology to identify waste types and provide sorting guidance
home.wasteTrackingDesc: Track different types of waste - plastic, glass, and paper throughout your recycling journey
home.globalStatsDesc: See the collective environmental impact of all EcoPoint users worldwide

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: EcoPoint is an innovative platform for simplifying the waste recycling process
about.missionText: The goal of the project is to reduce waste in public spaces by motivating residents to properly dispose and segregate it. The smart bin system supports zero waste strategies and reduces negative human impact on the environment, contributing to improved quality of life in cities.
about.ecoFriendlyDesc: Reduce waste in public spaces and support zero waste strategies through smart recycling solutions
about.convenienceDesc: Build a sense of shared responsibility and promote eco-friendly attitudes. Gamification elements make recycling attractive for younger generations
about.transparencyDesc: Lower city cleaning costs, optimize waste collection, and support circular economy while enabling commercial partners to build responsible brand image
about.communityDesc: Join thousands of people who care about the environment and make cities cleaner together

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about EcoPoint? Want to partner with us? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.subject: Subject

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.message: Tell us how we can help...

contact.partnershipDesc: Interested in bringing EcoPoint to your city or business? Let's discuss how we can work together to create a more sustainable future.
contact.teamTitle: Meet the Better Than Never Team
contact.teamSubtitle: Passionate innovators working to make recycling rewarding and accessible for everyone
contact.missionDesc: At EcoPoint, we believe that technology and gamification can transform how cities approach waste management. Our mission is to make recycling accessible, rewarding, and fun while creating measurable environmental impact. Together with communities, businesses, and local governments, we're building the sustainable cities of tomorrow.

profile.subtitle: Track your recycling journey and environmental impact
profile.keepGoing: Keep going! You're making a real difference

portal.title: Portal EcoPoint
portal.subtitle: Waste management system and cooperation with local businesses
portal.employeeDescription: System for municipal services and operations management
portal.employeeFeature1: Real-time monitoring of fill levels to ensure timely emptying
portal.employeeFeature2: Route optimization for waste collection and CO₂ emission reduction
portal.employeeFeature3: Raw material management analysis and segregation
portal.businessDescription: System for local businesses and partners
portal.businessFeature1: Creation and management of promotional offers
portal.businessFeature2: Monitoring offer usage and campaign statistics
portal.businessFeature3: Increased brand recognition and new customers
portal.ecologyDescription: Reducing CO₂ emissions and optimizing waste management
portal.socialDescription: Engaging residents in city life and ecological education
portal.economyDescription: Supporting local businesses and developing a circular economy
